verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end, \w a|strong="H1732"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w O|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w not|strong="H3559"\w* thou silent \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w praise|strong="H2167"\w*: \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* wicked \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* mouth \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3559"\w* deceitful man \w is|strong="H0430"\w* opened against \w me|strong="H3820"\w*.

They have spoken against with deceitful tongues; \w and|strong="H3658"\w* they have compassed me about with words \w of|strong="H5035"\w* hatred; \w and|strong="H3658"\w* have fought against me without cause.

Instead \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w making|strong="H3034"\w* me \w a|strong="H3068"\w* return \w of|strong="H3068"\w* love, \w they|strong="H3068"\w* detracted me: \w but|strong="H5971"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H3034"\w* myself \w to|strong="H3068"\w* prayer.

\w And|strong="H8064"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* repaid \w me|strong="H5921"\w* evil \w for|strong="H3588"\w* good: \w and|strong="H8064"\w* hatred \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w love|strong="H2617"\w*.

\w Set|strong="H7311"\w* thou \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sinner \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w may|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* devil stand \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* right hand.

When he \w is|strong="H3225"\w* judged, \w may|strong="H4616"\w* he go out condemned; \w and|strong="H3225"\w* \w may|strong="H4616"\w* \w his|strong="H3467"\w* prayer be turned \w to|strong="H4616"\w* sin.
\w May|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H1696"\w* days \w be|strong="H0430"\w* few: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H1696"\w* bishopric let another take.
May \w his|strong="H4519"\w* children be fatherless, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w his|strong="H4519"\w* wife \w a|strong="H2710"\w* widow.

Let \w his|strong="H5921"\w* children be \w carried|strong="H5921"\w* \w about|strong="H5921"\w* vagabonds, \w and|strong="H4124"\w* beg; \w and|strong="H4124"\w* let \w them|strong="H5921"\w* be \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* dwellings.

\w May|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* userer search \w all|strong="H5704"\w* \w his|strong="H5704"\w* substance: \w and|strong="H5704"\w* let strangers plunder \w his|strong="H5704"\w* labours.

\w May|strong="H0430"\w* there \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* help \w him|strong="H3318"\w*: \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H0430"\w* pity \w his|strong="H3808"\w* fatherless offspring.

\w May|strong="H0120"\w* \w his|strong="H0120"\w* posterity be cut off; \w in|strong="H0120"\w* \w one|strong="H0120"\w* generation \w may|strong="H0120"\w* \w his|strong="H0120"\w* name be blotted out.

\w May|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* iniquity \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* fathers \w be|strong="H0430"\w* remembered \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sight \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* Lord: \w and|strong="H0430"\w* let not \w the|strong="H6213"\w* sin \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H1931"\w* mother \w be|strong="H0430"\w* blotted \w out|strong="H6213"\w*.
May they be before the lord continually, and let the memory of them perish from the earth:
Because he remembered not to show mercy,
But persecuted the poor man and the beggar; and the broken in heart, to put him to death.

And he loved cursing, and it shall come unto him: and he would not have blessing, and it shall be far from him. And he put on cursing, like a garment: and it went in like water into his entrails, and like oil in his bones.
May it be unto him like a garment which covereth him; and like a girdle with which he is girded continually.
This is the work of them who detract me before the Lord; and who speak evils against my soul.
But thou, O Lord, do with for thy names sake: because thy mercy is sweet. Do thou deliver me.
For I am poor and needy, and my heart is troubled within me.
I am taken away like the shadow when it declineth: and I am shaken off as locusts.
My knees are weakened through fasting: and my flesh is changed for oil.
And I am become a reproach to them: they saw me and they shaked their heads,
Help me, O Lord my God; save me according to thy mercy.
And let them know that this is thy hand: and that thou, O Lord, hast done it.
They will curse and thou will bless: let them that rise up against me be confounded: but thy servant shall rejoice.
Let them that detract me be clothed with shame: and let them be covered with the their confusion as with a double cloak.
I will give great thanks to the Lord with my mouth: and in the midst of many I will praise him.
Because he hath stood at the right hand of the poor, to save my soul from persecutors.
